<!-- ABOUT THE PROJECT -->
<h2 id="About_The_Project">ğŸ–¼ï¸ About The Project</h2>

For those of you who want to know information about the JBNU,
this is a chat bot that can be run by Slack

Need to know information about JBNU while working on a team project with Slack ? Just use this!

![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

<h2 id="Feature">ğŸ“Ÿ Feature</h2>

- Q & A
  - Academic Calendar
  - School Cafeteriaâ€™s Today Menu with â­(Max 3 star)
  - Each departmentâ€™s information
- Simple Calculation
  - You can get squared number
- To be added

![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

<h2 id="Source_Files_Description">ğŸ“’ Source Files Description</h2>

- /src/bot
  - this is bot class files
- greeting.js
  - where bot greetings
- square.js
  - where bot calculate
- main.js
  - where your program starts

![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

<h2 id="API">ğŸ›ï¸ API</h2>


[\***\*Slack Real Time Messaging\*\***](<[https://slack.dev/node-slack-sdk/rtm-api](https://slack.dev/node-slack-sdk/rtm-api)>)

![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

<h2 id="Requirements">ğŸª› Requirements</h2>

- node -version : [up 16.x]
- slack workspace & app
  - Before start you should create Slack Workspace.
    In your workspace, make app (to use rtm-api, app should be classic app)
    guide for making a classic app is [here](<[https://api.slack.com/authentication/basics](https://api.slack.com/authentication/basics)>)

![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

<h2 id="Getting_Started">â›³ Getting Started</h2>

- Clone project

  ```bash
  git clone https://github.com/10TeamPro/botProject.git
  ```

- install npm

  ```bash
  npm install
  ```

- make new folder and file in ./config/bot.json

  in bot.json
  go to your app Bot User token and copy that text starts with â€˜xoxb-\*â€™
  you can add more private configuration text here

  ```bash
  "MAIN_TOKEN": "xoxb-YOURTOKEN",
  ```

- run bot

  ```bash
  node src/main.js
  ```

![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

<h2 id="Contributions">ğŸŠ Contributions</h2>

If you find some errors or needs improvement
Please PR according to the suggested eslint and prettier
( related commit rules are specified in [Notion](<[https://www.notion.so/ae66f937dda740eab1689d22e6f8dae1](https://www.notion.so/ae66f937dda740eab1689d22e6f8dae1)>) )

Always welcome

- PR welcome
- Issue Welcome
